- A **theme or plugin conflict** blocking shortcode rendering
- A known issue with **Elementor’s shortcode sanitisation** (rare, but possible)

learnings.details:
Polling frequency matters |
| 🧪 Formatting Limitations | Notion API limits block formatting; complex layouts might need workarounds |
| 🔒 Access & Permissions | You’ll need to carefully manage Notion share settings (likely one shared workspace with individual pages per client) |

---

## ✅ When to Use This Hybrid Setup

| Use Case | Go For It? |
|----------|-------------|
| You want to manage strategy projects where clients provide input and co-edit deliverables | ✅ Perfect match |
| You want everything to happen inside Glide with no external tools | ❌ Not ideal—use Glide-only or Google Docs instead |
| You have clients comfortable with Notion | ✅ Easy win |
| You want complete ownership of UX but still need collaborative doc space | ✅ Glide + Notion hybrid is ideal |
